title: Idea for chat ban honor
body:
Not sure where to add it so I will add it here.
I just got a chat ban for 10 games and now it is over I am left at level 1. Adding a new way bar for the level 1 would help a lot of people that have gotten chat ban like my self.

Because right now I dont know if I need 100 honor or 10 honor to achieve level 2 honor or not. I have seen some people say that they have been on level one for almost 6 months.
That to me seems a bit insane but lets face it. I got a 10 game chat ban about 30 games ago now and I haven't gotten any chat ban or anything since but I am still level 1.

How many honor do I need to get level 2 and start going higher? All I see is a lock. Am I continuously locked at 1 now for going tilt in 2 games. 
That seems to be a bit over the top for what I have done.

replies.body: I think the shortest amount of time I've heard of someone getting from honour 1 to 2 was about 3 weeks, and that was with pretty consistent positivity. Being neutral will take you a bit longer of course, and if you slip up from time to time it'll slow you down a bit as well. Remember that even for players starting at level 2 checkpoint 3, this is meant to be a season long achievement, it's not going to be the quickest thing to get.

The thing is. Why I ask. My gril.. She plays ARAM and every now and then goes into rank. But she is level 4 honor now.
Season started little while ago. But she goes up in honor like no tomorrow.
Totally confused.

ARAM games are quicker, meaning more honor over the same amount of time.

And generally you will see 5 honor's used in ARAM more then Summoners Rift (at least from personal experience.)
Now that I think about it I've noticed the same (though I don't play much ARAM), I never really considered that ARAM only or mostly players would gain honour a lot faster. Good to know.
You see plenty of honour given in ARAM's if you win, very few if you lose.
Yeah i was dishonourable last season and eversince then i couldnt get my rewards back. no matter how much honours i get this thing will never go away. its set up like that which is frustrating
